title: Angel Hair Pasta and Chicken with Oriental Dressing
directions: Combine peanut butter, sesame oil, vegetable oil, orange juice, vinegar, soy sauce, mustard and chili oil in small bowl. Mix until smooth. Season with salt and ground black pepper.
Toss pasta, chicken, green onions and dressing in medium bowl.

Nutritional Information Per Serving (1/4 of recipe): Calories: 791 Calories from Fat: 519 Total Fat: 57.7 g Saturated Fat: 9.4 g Cholesterol: 41 mg Sodium: 799 mg Carbohydrates: 44.3 g Dietary Fiber: 2.8 g Sugars: 3 g Protein: 27.3 g.
ingredients: 1 (9-ounce) package BUITONIÂ® Angel Hair Pasta, prepared according to package directions, kept hot hot
